error.message: Call to deprecated function drupal_realpath(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystem::realpath().
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to ibm_watson.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
A drupal/core requirement is not present in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement.
